Text: Question Presubmittal for Floor MeetingSir Thank you for taking questions Attached is a presentation which I believe is worth M year with very little capital investment With your permission Id like to arrange to see you for minutes to present this new venture With due respect Lou Pai has been the only person who has not thought these two products would be a natural progression for Enron If you are willing to discuss further I would ask Jay Lewis to also attend Thank you again Gregg Cooper Forwarded by Gregg CooperHOUEES on AM Enron Energy Services From EES Distribution AM To EES HOUSTON EMPLOYEES cc Subject Reminder Please join Jeff Skilling on Wednesday August at pm near EB to share information about activities he and the OOC believe are important to us as a company and answer questions about our businesses strategies issues or anything of interest to you concerning Enron If you would like to presubmit a question please send them to Jeff Skilling directly or fax to him at Hope to see everyone there
